articles.description: Martin Compston said that Sean Connery once launched a foul-mouthed tirade at a Michelin-starred chef during a posh dinner.
articles.content:
The James Bond actor, who died in 2020, allegedly interrupted the chef who was describing the meal during a posh dinner at Edinburgh Castle by telling him to "just get on with it". 
Line of Duty sta… [+778 chars]

articles.title: King Charles suffers embarrassing yet relatable blunder that's caught on camera - The Mirror
articles.description: King Charles was joined by wife Queen Camilla during a visit to Brick Lane in East London - and while dropping by one important building was snapped with an unfortunate faux pas
articles.content:
King Charles nearly always looks perfectly put together when out on royal engagements.
He's pretty much always seen in a smart suit with a crisp white shirt, a chic tie and shiny shoes.
